txt.en:
'Ora sent you? I suppose I could use some help. I have an injured scout here, so I dare not venture out of shouting range -- but another of my scouts, Ida, is very late in reporting back.

'Go check on her, if you wish to be of use -- she is at our supply encampment just south of here, along the road. There have also been reports of smoke being seen coming from a homestead, too... make sure everything is as it should be.

'And if she is all right, find out what has been keeping her!'

'What? Who are you? Lauri sent you to check on me? I am all right; I just took a few bruises.

'There is a homestead further west along the road, past the hill on which Pynti-peldot is built, that is being terrorized by a Gauradan. We do not see many of them in Itä-mâ.

'I barely made it back here to recuperate; I was trying to chase the invader off, and his accursed wolf flanked me....'
'I am so relieved to find out Ida is all right!'
Lauri reported that one of his scouts, Ida, has been missing for some time and that there has been smoke recently seen in the sky near one of the Lossoth homesteads, west of Pynti-peldot.
Check on Ida at the supply-encampment

Ida's supply-encampment is to the south of Pynti-peldot, next to the road and near the entrance to the ice canyons.\n\nLauri has asked you to investigate Ida's supply-encampment and make sure she is not hurt.
